ComicInfo.Summary: The cast of Peanuts battle the Punisher, Lobo battles Cathy. Superman attacks Dagwood Bumstead and Sylvester battles Alfred.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 15:34:28. [CVDB146298] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:51:05. [Issue ID 250710]

ComicInfo.Title: South Park Cards; Video Games: Final Fantasy Painful Reality; Real Life Impossible Missions!; But on the Other Hand...; Toon Town Babylon; Must Flee TV; New TV Shows We'd Like to See!; When Sitcoms Go Ape!; New Specialty Cable Channels; Comic Book vs. Comic Strip Crossover Battles!; Saturday Morning Cartoons That Never Quite Caught on...; Off the Hook; How to Buy Cracked Magazine!; Pro Sports Public Relations Disasters!; The Stale Prince; The Simpranos; Cracked Charities That Need Your Support!
